question: Kiran Nagarkar, who passed away recently, was the renowned personality in which field?
explanation: Kiran Nagarkar (77), the acclaimed English-Marathi novelist and playwright, has passed away in Mumbai, Maharashtra on 5th September 2019. He was known for his works  such as \'\'Saat Sakkam Trechalis\'\' (Seven Sixes Are Forty Three) (1974), \'\'Ravan and Eddie\'\' (1994) and the epic English novel \'\'Cuckold\'\' (1997). He  released his latest novel \'\'Jasoda\'\' in November 2017.
